name: Bob's Dice-y Adventrue
description:
"here at Balls In Yo Jaws Gamin', we don't know how to make a game! but we tried our best so vote plz" - oshibru (guy who partially helped and his logo)

"We are a pair of sixth form students that have just finished. We studied Computer Science and made games in Unity that weren't that good lmao. This is our first game jam, we hope you like our game! =]" - Rhubarb Saab (more mature one)
